snippet.title: Sons of Ra - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming to you in 2021. 
Sign up for our next closed beta on our Discord: https://discord.gg/zV8R2Aw

Follow development on our twitter: https://twitter.com/PharHoundGames, and sign up for more updates at https://pharaohhound.games/social/

Sons of Ra is a competitive tower defense game where you take control of a pharaoh at war. Create overwhelming armies to destroy your opponents and construct powerful defenses to protect your palace. Sacrifice enemy troops to the Gods, summon their mighty abilities, and devastate your foes. Conquer the land, and become the one true Pharaoh of Egypt.
--------------
Links:
• Discord: https://discord.gg/zV8R2Aw
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/PharHoundGames
• Website: https://PharaohHound.games
